rooms.description: A spacious hall that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the entrance along the eastern wall. The flooring is finished with polished stone for a modern look.
Art Deco style living room featuring geometric patterns and elegant lines. Windows are strategically placed to invite natural light while maintaining privacy according to local norms.

Adjacent to the living area; designed with minimalistic Art Deco features and comfortable seating arrangements. Vastu guidelines ensure that dining is placed in a well-ventilated section of the villa.
The main bedroom offers ample space with Art Deco-inspired design elements. It is oriented to face north for better natural light while keeping privacy intact.
A functional bathroom attached to the master bedroom; designed with modern fixtures and careful consideration of drainage systems as per local building codes.
A dedicated library space that features built-in shelves and a cozy seating area. The room is oriented towards the west to balance energy according to Vastu principles.
A small balcony overlooking the garden space; designed with modern railings that respect local safety regulations and provide an outdoor relaxation area.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance door with Art Deco motifs. Vastu recommends this placement for positive energy flow.
Large windows that enhance natural light and air circulation in living areas.
Windows placed to provide cross ventilation as per local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
